name: Corporate Law
description: Provides legal services and advice to businesses, including corporate governance, mergers and acquisitions, and securities law.

name: Litigation and Dispute Resolution
description: Handles legal disputes and lawsuits, including arbitration, mediation, and trial representation for individuals and organizations.

name: Intellectual Property Law
description: Focuses on protecting and enforcing intellectual property rights, including patents, trademarks, copyrights, and trade secrets.

name: Employment and Labor Law
description: Advises on employment-related issues, including labor laws, employee benefits, and workplace disputes.

name: Real Estate Law
description: Handles legal aspects of property transactions, including buying, selling, and developing commercial and residential properties.

name: Bankruptcy and Restructuring
description: Assists individuals and businesses with debt restructuring, bankruptcy filings, and creditor rights.

name: Family Law
description: Handles legal issues related to family relationships, including divorce, child custody, and estate planning.

name: Criminal Law
description: Defends individuals and organizations accused of criminal offenses, including white-collar crimes and regulatory violations.

name: Immigration Law
description: Assists individuals and businesses with immigration-related issues, including visa applications, green cards, and deportation defense.

name: Tax Law
description: Advises on tax planning, compliance, and disputes, including international tax law and tax litigation.

name: Environmental Law
description: Handles legal issues related to environmental regulations, including pollution, land use, and natural resource management.

name: Healthcare Law
description: Advises healthcare providers, insurers, and patients on legal issues related to healthcare, including regulatory compliance and medical malpractice.

name: Technology and Data Privacy Law
description: Focuses on legal issues related to technology, data privacy, and cybersecurity, including data breaches and regulatory compliance.

name: Government Contracts and Procurement
description: Assists businesses with government contracting, including bid protests, contract disputes, and regulatory compliance.

name: Non-Profit and Charitable Organizations
description: Advises non-profit organizations on legal issues related to governance, tax exemption, and regulatory compliance.
